Name: Faith of Fate
About the game: Faith of Fate Is A Rogue Like RPG Game About Two Lovers Living In A Faithless World Ruled By Cupid Where You Will Fight Many Lovely Characters In Your Road, Choosing Their Fate, Making Choices With Your Friends, Becoming Stronger And Writing Your Own Story With Your Faith. You Have The Fate On Your Hands, What Will You Do? Heaven Or Hell? FEATURES +200 Random Levels Each Time You Play An Interactive Story Based On Decisions Many Lovely Characters Who Want To Kill You Random Items With Even More Random Effects Lore Rich Story And Hidden Mysteries You Are Important To Us ❤ LOVE AND HATE You Can Choose The Fate Of The characters Using LOVE Or HATE, Both Have Their Own Stats And Interactions, But Be Careful, Your Items And Decisions Can Make You Lose Control Of Which You Use
